name: @Decodo/decodo-mcp-server
description:
Enable your AI agents to scrape and parse web content dynamically, including geo-restricted sites, by leveraging Decodo's scraping capabilities.

To use, head on over to https://dashboard.decodo.com, start a free Web Advanced trial and input the generated credentials into your MCP client of choice on the right-hand side of this page.

tools.name: scrape_as_markdown
tools.description: Scrape the contents of a website and return Markdown-formatted results

geo.description: Geolocation of the desired request, expressed as a country name

jsRender.description: Should the request be opened in a headless browser, false by default

tokenLimit.description: The number of tokens to return in the response - anything above this limit will be truncated

fullResponse.description: If true, content will not be truncated

tools.name: google_search_parsed
tools.description: Scrape Google Search results with automatic parsing

geo.description: Geolocation of the desired request, expressed as a country name

jsRender.description: Should the request be opened in a headless browser, false by default

tools.name: amazon_search_parsed
tools.description: Scrape Amazon Search results with automatic parsing

geo.description: Geolocation of the desired request, expressed as a country name

jsRender.description: Should the request be opened in a headless browser, false by default

tools.name: reddit_subreddit
tools.description: Scrape Reddit subreddit results with automatic parsing
